data.message: Whats really sad is that Eminem had to spit a rap about Trump just to become relevant again...whats sadder is all you assbags that jumped on shady’s dick and rode first class on the anti-Trump train...how about you get your own opinion, formulate your own ideas and stop being a bunch of ill informed, copy cat, zombie bitchs ;)

replies.message: Always wondered what happened to Mike Jones.
Looks like you on shady dicks since your commenting on his page
Mike JonesWow hey bud you need a life

You're a moron, Mike Jones.  First off, Eminen is (arguably) one of if not the greatest rapper, period.  He doesn't need to "become relevant again" because he always was & will be relevant.  That's what happens when you're one of the greatest at what you do.

Secondly, you complain about Em's fans not being able to "formulate our own ideas" and how we need to "hop off his dick".  Yet, you strike me as one of those "MAGA" on everything kinda people.  I don't expect a staunch Trump supporter to get that level of irony.  Eminem fans would cuz, you know, thinking and stuff.

Well said Ward
A dumbass finished yes, ideas well stopped dangerous this a character, he will gest lost

Bahahaha...ok...first off - I usually dont argue with liberals cause its like talking to a fucking mold infested wall...anyways...Im actually not all MAGA, MAGA, MAGA...and I grew up in Detroit 3 miles from Em’s “area/hood”....is Em great?...fuck yea...Greatest?...maybe...but this cock sucker went after a dude for legit no reason other than he would get a lot of support for his album prior to it dropping...period...Donald Trump was never labeled a racist until he ran as a Republican amd beat that piece lf shit Hillary...so stop kidding yourself, and go suck start a shotgun you ignorant Left wing shitheads
